item.title: Patricio Del Boca - vibe coding is the fast fashion industry of software engineering
item.description: TL;DR: My take on AI for programming and "vibe coding" is that it will do to software engineering what fast fashion did to the clothing industry: flood the market with cheap, low-quality products and excessive waste.

item.title: Fingine: Thoughts on Side Projects and Financial Simulation
item.description: One ambition of mine is to retire relatively early (around 55) and in the period prior to that to take jobs without consideration for their financial compensation. To achieve that, I pay attention to how my net worth, savings rate, and investments track with my goals using the coast FIRE calculator.

item.title: The Anti-Abundance Critique on Housing Is Dead Wrong
item.description: Antitrust critics say that homebuilding monopolies are the real culprit of America’s housing woes. I looked into some of their claims. They don’t hold up.
